### Lisa Gollot
Lisa has a background in environmental chemistry and agronomy. Within the course of her MSc studies in ecotoxicology at [AgroParisTech](https://www.agroparistech.fr/en), she joined our team for a 6-month internship focusing on the modeling of individual differences in earthworm growth under different pesticide exposure regimes.  She has just started her PhD with us in October 2023 on similar topics.

Background: Analytical Chemistry, Ecotoxicology

Project: [Eco-evolutionary dynamics](../projects#EEWORMS) 

Co-supervisors: [Rémy Beaudouin (INERIS)](https://umr-sebio.fr/personnel/remy-beaudouin), [Juliette Faburé (EcoSys)](https://www6.versailles-grignon.inrae.fr/ecosys/Personnes/Personnel-par-ordre-alphabetique/F/FABURE-Juliette)
:::

### Antoine Bamière
Antoine is an Assistant Engineer in soil fauna and is in charge of arthropod rearing in our research unit. He also assists with fieldwork and experimental projects dedicated to the ecotoxicology of soil organisms.

### Perrine Legrand

Perrine is a first-year MSc student in evolutionary biology at [Université de Lille](). She  focused on developing methods for evaluating the effects of pesticide exposure on soil fauna in a simplified trophic network.

Background: Biodiversity, Ecology and Evolution

Project: [Effect of pesticides in simplified soil trophic networks](../projects#EPIC)

### Magali Dahirel
Magali completed her MSc. in ecological modeling at [Université de Rennes 1](https://formations.univ-rennes.fr/master-mention-biodiversite-ecologie-evolution-parcours-modelisation-en-ecologie-mode). She worked with us on an agent-based model of aphid-ladybeetle dynamics under pesticide exposure.

Background: Biodiversity, Ecology and Evolution

Project: [TRAVERSéES](https://ecophytopic.fr/recherche-innovation/concevoir-son-systeme/projet-traversees)

Co-supervisors: [Corinne Robert (EcoSys)](https://www6.versailles-grignon.inrae.fr/ecosys/Personnes/Personnel-Eco-Phy/Scientifiques-Eco-Phy/ROBERT-Corinne), [Pierre-Antoine Précigout (EcoSys)](https://www6.versailles-grignon.inrae.fr/ecosys/Personnes/Personnel-Eco-Phy/Scientifiques-Eco-Phy/PRECIGOUT-Pierre-Antoine), [Colette Bertrand (EcoSys)](https://www6.versailles-grignon.inrae.fr/ecosys/Personnes/Personnel-Sol-Tox/Scientifiques-Sol-Tox/BERTRAND-Colette)
